Help Us Change the World

Girl Develop It is the leading nonprofit organization providing accessible learning programs for adult women. Our reach, membership and impact are unparalleled.

Supporters

Supporters of Girl Develop It make a commitment to diversity in tech. By supporting our organization, you are helping us grow our impact. Girl Develop It is currently serving 35,000 members in 50 cities in the US. With the support of companies like yours, we are better equipped to expand and deepen our impact. Our organization is more than just classes. Girl Develop It’s in-person, culture-centered approach to create learning communities means that women progress from students to teachers to leaders and technical professionals over time.

Donate

If you want to support women in technology and women transitioning into tech careers today, you can help us improve the technology industry's diversity problem now. We appreciate all contributions from individuals and companies of any amount, and we put them to good use to grow the amount of and impact on our students. All donations are 501c3 tax-deductible. By supporting Girl Develop It, you are supporting the ideal that it’s never too late to learn. Girl Develop It engages students from age 18-70, and we firmly believe that there should be avenues for women of all ages to benefit from the opportunities and rewards provided by learning web development.

To learn about ways to support the Girl Develop It Dayton Chapter, email us at dayton@girldevelopit.com
